author: alito
text:
560 U. S. ____ (2010)560 U. S. ____ (2010)560 U. S. ____ (2010)SUPREME COURT OF THE UNITED STATESNO. 09-223RICHARD A. LEVIN, TAX COMMISSIONER OF OHIO,
PETITIONERv.COMMERCE ENERGY, INC., et al.on writ of certiorari to the united states court of
appeals for the sixth circuit[June 1, 2010]Justice Alito, concurring in the
judgment.I agree with the Court that
principles of comity bar the present action. I am doubtful about
the Court’s efforts to distinguishHibbsv.Winn,542 U. S. 88(2004), but whether today’s holding underminesHibbs’
foundations is a question that can be left for another day.
